function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Intermittent loss of wifi communication in the laboratory","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in relative humidity levels within the laboratory","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous increase in eco2 values despite open windows","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Connection loss due to low wifi signal","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in values based on the position of the smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calibration errors due to imprecise sensor","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High eco2 levels in indoor environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and ventilation control in winter and summer","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air quality monitoring leading to potential spread of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to sensor malfunction or misconfiguration","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data security risks related to sensor communication","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly infectious sars-cov-2 virus spreading between people in close contact","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 leading to significant confirmed cases and deaths","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in complying with social distancing and capacity limitations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased gatherings in leisure areas and markets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crowds and hotspots in urban areas increasing the likelihood of contagion","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups in high-risk areas near schools and nursing homes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of risk areas in the city related to contagion propagation.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability of the danger model to accurately capture the usual functioning of the city and the routines of its citizens.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Identification of areas with the highest risk of contagion based on the occupancy model and knowledge base","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Construction of safe pedestrian routes in a covid-19 pandemic context","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of the proposed service for purposes other than covid-19 safety, such as avoiding sunny areas in summer or closed streets due to events","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for pandemic containment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on specific technological solutions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended consequences of technology integration","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective detection of abnormal patterns in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlap between alert and mitigation applications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate crisis management and response to disease outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of sensors to detect symptoms may result in false positives or false negatives, leading to incorrect actions or delays in response.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring devices that track contact with infected people may raise privacy concerns and result in user resistance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crowdsourced smartphone data and social network analysis may lead to biased or inaccurate conclusions about the mental state of citizens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Standard message libraries for pandemic communication may lack cultural sensitivity and relevance to specific populations, leading to miscommunication or distrust.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation about pandemic management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of contact tracing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of communication with vulnerable groups","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate context parameters related to citizens’ distribution in the city","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on openstreetmap osm data for context parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of temporal characteristics in context parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on osm data for identifying high-occupancy areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupancy model for safe navigation during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inferencing occupation level of amenities through rule-based system approach","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease propagation in occupancy rules","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended privacy implications of tracking citizens’ routines and behaviour","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High occupancy levels during start and end of class times","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unpredictable occupancy levels during class time","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High level of occupancy in extracurricular activities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission among children.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fluctuations in occupancy levels in hospitals can impact the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The risk of covid-19 transmission in areas with high occupancy levels","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
